### Graph of San Mateo County PM2.5 Pollution

```{r}
plotlyOutput("plot1")
```

```{r, context = "server"}
observeEvent({
  input$city_interest
  }, {

  chart1 <- smc_data %>%
    filter(
      city %in% c(
        input$city_interest
      )
    ) %>%
    ggplot(
      aes(
        x = date,
        y = PM25
      )
    ) +
    geom_line(
      aes(
        color = city 
      )
    ) +
    labs(
      x = "Date",
      y = "PM2.5 Pollution (micro-g / m^3)",
      title = paste0("Outdoor PM2.5 Pollution of SMC Jurisdictions"),
      color = "City"
    ) +
    theme(legend.position = "top")

  output$plot1 <- renderPlotly({
    chart1 %>%
      ggplotly() %>%
      config(displayModeBar = F)
  })

})
```



### Map of San Mateo County PM2.5 Pollution

```{r}
leafletOutput("map")
```

```{r, context = "server"}
observeEvent({
  input$city_interest
  }, {

  
  pm25_pal <- colorNumeric(
    palette = "RdYlGn",
    reverse = T,
    domain = 
      map_data$PM25
  )
  
  output$map <- renderLeaflet({
    leaflet() %>% 
      
      addProviderTiles(provider = providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>% 
    
      
      addPolygons(
        data = map_data,
        fillColor = "grey",
        color = "grey",
        opacity = 0.5,
        fillOpacity = 0.25,
        weight = 1,

      ) %>% 
      
      addPolygons(
        data = map_data %>% filter(city %in% input$city_interest),
        fillColor = ~pm25_pal(PM25),
        color = "white",
        opacity = 0.5,
        fillOpacity = 0.5,
        weight = 1,
        label = ~paste0(
          round(PM25,2), 
          " in ", city
        ),
        highlightOptions = highlightOptions(
          weight = 2,
          opacity = 1
        )
      )  %>%      
      
      addLegend(
        data = map_data,
        pal = pm25_pal,
        values = ~PM25,
        title = paste0("Micrograms of PM2.5 per<br>cubic meter of air, outdoor")
      )
  })
  
})
```
